greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Split-floor-multiplier sequence (SFMS) using multipliers 1/4 and 4. (SFMS is defined at A120229.)
comment: Self-inverse permutation of the natural numbers.
link: Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: a(n)=[n/4] if this is positive and new, else a(n)=4n.
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Jun 11 2006
